name: Mondocorp: Ludum Dare 34 Competition Entry
description:
This was my first entry into a solo game jam. I've always participated as an artist but never as a programmer, artist, designer hybrid! Ludum Dare 34's theme was tied between two button controls and grow. I chose to go with the grow and created Mondocorp

You're a hiring manager for the tech giant Mondocorp! The investors want to see the company grow but we need talent! Hire the correct employees before the year is up!

Controls

WASD - To move
Mouse 1 - To give money

If you were part of the jam and would like to vote, you can do so here.
